snippet.title: VAMPIRE: THE MASQUERADE - Reckoning of New York Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Vampire: The Masquerade - Reckoning of New York is a World of Darkness narrative game set in the Big Apple 🍎 With light RPG Elements and a deep storyline, it offers a grand finale to the New York Vampire Trilogy
🩸 Wishlist NOW: https://vampirereckoning.com/

🧛‍♀️ What's Vampire: The Masquerade - Reckoning of New York about?
Vampire: The Masquerade - Reckoning of New York is a narrative game set in the World of Darkness Universe. Play as one of the members of the Vampire Clans in a shifting political landscape between the Camarilla and the Anarchs while trying your best to survive.

-----
